Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: nyes designs
Reviews.Content: This Panasonic 32" lcd hdtv was advertised as new and that it was.  It arrived shortly after I ordered in execellent condition, even though it could have been packaged a little better.  The features are better than I expected with high definition on a number of channels that are automatic. I read all the reviews on this television and decided this was the best one could buy.  It is a lot better than my Akai television that lasted all of three years.
